description.value:
Trigger You critically succeed when using the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feats.Item.2ORcBQibJPXCHyiJ]{Third Eye} reaction

Your masterful deflection is able to connect into a glancing blow. Make a Strike using your Samurai Weapon against the triggering creature. This strike cannot be Critical Success, such result is reduced to a regular Success. The creature then becomes immune to Shining into the Void for 1 hour.

Special If the strike is benefiting from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.feats.Item.Jg8sY6z96yK1HDkW]{Total Concentration}, you do not lower a Critical Success result to a Success.
